title: Advanced SystemCare Pro 9.0.3.1077 Multilingual Incl Patch-=TEAM

Advanced SystemCare Pro 9 Features:
â€¢ Keeps your PC running at peak performance. Fully optimizes Windows for ultimate system performance and top Internet speed by unleashing the built-in power of your system, based on how you use your PC and your network configuration. It turns your PC into a business PC, a productive workstation, an entertainment center, a game machine, or a scientific computing PC.
â€¢ Defends PC security with extra protection. Detects and analyzes Windows security environment. Scans and removes spyware and adware using up-to-date definition files in order to prevent spyware, hackers and hijackers from installing malicious programs on your computer. Erases and updates your PCâ€™s activity histories.
â€¢ One click to solve as many as 10 common PC problems. Advanced SystemCare inherits the ease-of-use from previous versions, with more powerful capabilities. With one click, it scans and repairs ten PC problems and protects your PC from hidden security threats.
â€¢ Real-time optimization with ActiveBoost function. ActiveBoost, technology that actively runs in the background intelligently managing system resources in real-time, constantly detects inactive resources and optimizes CPU and RAM usage.
â€¢ More than 20 dedicated smart tools for everyday PC maintenance. Advanced SystemCare integrates IObitâ€™s latest Toolbox, with more than 20 dedicated smart tools for everyday PC maintenance as well as advanced needs. The Toolbox feature has tools for system cleaning, optimizing and repairing, tools for security enhancement, and tools for full control over the PC system.
â€¢ Cloud technology to keep database up-to-date. The new â€œCloudâ€ technology ensures the database is kept updated at all times so that you can benefit from the latest definitions and configurations.
â€¢ Boost your PC for working and gaming. You now have two Turbo Boost options, Work Mode and Game Mode. In addition, you can now adjust the configuration of each mode from the main screen.
â€¢ Next-generation registry deep clean and optimizer. Safely cleans registry junk, compacts registry bloats and defragments the whole registry for maximum performance. Finds and fixes the registry errors that other utilities miss with â€œDeep Scanâ€ technology.
â€¢ Automatically works in the background. This powerful utility works continuously, automatically and quietly in the background on your PC. You can set the program on a regular schedule or just let it work automatically when your PC is idle.
â€¢ New UI technology for quicker start and less resource usage! With the new UI technology, Advanced SystemCare will start up faster using fewer system resources.
â€¢ New architecture and re-written source codes for 32bit/64bit system! These improvements will make your PC work more efficiently and steadily, stabilizing even older systems.
â€¢ Improved Care module with more powerful clean and optimization functions. The new developments in the â€œCareâ€ module include features such as â€œStart-up Optimizationâ€, which will scan and clean your PC much more effectively.
â€¢ Powerful hard drive defragmentation. Fast, powerfully and incredibly effective Disk Defrag function to defragment hard drives â€“ up to 10 times faster than other defragmentation tools.

What's New in Version 9.0.3.1077:
